channel.title: Error when importing the Workstation
channel.description:
Hi, I'm trying to switch from Virtualbox to KVM. The Gateway is running well but when I try to import the Workstation with:
virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Workstation*.xml
Here is the error I see:
error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-15.0.0.7.1.xml error: unsupported configuration: unknown codec type 'output'
--- libvirt-bin qemu-kvm 1:2.8+dfsg-6+deb9u8 virt-manager 1:1.4.0-5

item.title: Error when importing the Workstation
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
welet:

error: unsupported configuration: unknown codec type ‘output’

welet:

qemu-kvm 1:2.8+dfsg-6+deb9u8

Yes here’s the problem. This feature for disabling VM microphones is only availabl in Debian 10.

You will need to either migrate to Debian stable current or remove this setting from the XML. Please read the wiki for instructions for config editing.

Read full topic
